name: Unlimited Ghost Flight
summary: You put your connection to the material world farther behind you.
description:
You put your connection to the material world farther behind you. Your fly Speed no longer restricts the height you can fly. When you use Ghost Flight, instead of its normal effect, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your fly Speed for 10 minutes.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
